Name: Royal Toast
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Rich cherry liqueur flavours are balanced by dry vermouth and lifted by vodka.
History: Adapted from a recipe "by W. E. Edwards" in the 1937 United Kingdom Bartender' Guild Approved Cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Royal Toast contains 213 calories
